1.content:
"I must see the head witch, please it’s urgent, I beg of you, let me see her!" the mad lady screamed, tugging at the front of Nicholas' uniform.

Try as he did, Nicholas could not get her to let go. The lady had turned up, with a bruise on her head and a crazed look in her sapphire eyes, demanding to see the head witch- whoever she was!

"Please have mercy! My only son will die! He didn’t mean to insult the sea god- he thought he didn’t exist. It was a mistake!"
"But I don't know any head witch- you have the wrong guy!"

"NO! Please I know you're her secret keeper! PLEASE LET ME SEE HER!!!!!!!!!!" the lady screamed, now in hysteria!

“I’m no-one's secret keeper! Well except maybe Natasha's; but that's because I'm her best friend..." Nicholas said; turning to face Natasha- who was fiddling with an oak leaf from the tree next to their classroom

She was smiling rather oddly. "Natasha- you aren't the head witch are you!?" He asked

"If I am?!" she simply asked. Nicholas stared at her, then back at the lady who didn't seem to notice his exchange with Natasha. "She can't see me unless you let her to!" said Natasha, noticing his puzzlement at her ignorance of the exchange

"Is that why she's screaming so much?!" he asked Natasha who nodded and said, "I guess you can let her see me. I'll set her right!!"

Nicholas turned to the lady. She looked at him with tear stained eyes. Pointing to Natasha he said, “There’s your head witch! Plead with her!”

Eyes widened in fright and recognition the lady got down on her knees. But Natasha shook her head. The lady looked down for a moment; then got up and left. Nicholas stared after her and then back at Natasha, who said “MY no is no!”
1.title: Morning Confrontations

11.content:
Nicholas stared at the door thro which the lady had left and then looked back at Nathasha who went back to reading her book.

"I don't get it" he said sitting down opposite to her, "what's going on?? Since when were you the head witch? when did you become a witch in the First place? What do you mean invisible to everyone? and what secret keeper?"


Nathasha didn't reply or look up from her book. Nicholas was starting to loose his temper. "Nathasha, ANSWER ME!!!"

She sighed. "fine" she said, closing her book to look up to him, "just calm down and i'll explian"

Nicholas looked away from her .... wondering, "how did I ever think that I knew this girl?"
11.title: After the lady left

111.content:
"I should have realized that there was something different!!" Nicholas thought to himself.

After all, he had never had many friends... until Nathasha joined his school last term!!!

he had ran into her on her first day here...

In fact... he had literally ran into her !!!

he was actually late for class that day and was running down the corridor, whereas she was walking round trying to find out where her class was.

Turning a corner nicholas ran straight into her and both went crashing down along with a pile of mopes and pails that the school janitor had, coincidently, near by....

which led to both of them earning a detention (from the school principals, whose room was on the same floor) and they were send off to class... which was when they discovered that Nathasha was in Nicholas' class...

It was as though it was fate, they struck an instant friendship and Nicholas walked into class with a bright smile on his face and announced to his teacher, "Ma'am, This is Nathasha.. she's joining our class!!"
111.title: Memories

1111.content:
Nathasha watched Nicholas sadly... "it dint have to be this way!!" she thought....

It just wasn't fair!! why did it have to be him? Nathasha knew so many others- older and more able for the task... but no!! It was Nicholas who was destined to be her protector... a fate he did not choose...

"if only I had been more careful!! None of this would have had to happen!!"


Nathasha was named as the head witch at birth- which was something unusual for the community.. For all generations before her, the head witch would live for at least a 150 years and rule for 90 years after which, all the mystics would gather at a place for the naming ceremony.. in which the fates would reveal who the next head would be.

but that was not the case ... The last head witch had died in unusual circumstances at the age of 40 (what the circumstances of his death were- was never told to Nathasha!!) There was a span of two years of utter chaos among the mystics before Nathasha was born- and the fates deemed her the new head witch...


Nathasha grew up with her parents (both tutors of magic and mystics) being trained to rule and judge the people... Her First protector was her music instructor, Mr. Andrews. As all protectors before him, Mr Andrews could not wield magic nor knew of the existence of the mystics- until his charge (Nathasha) was named as the head witch!! (this was to ensure that the secret keeper is never tempted to harm his/her charge and claim the title for himself/herself.


Nathasha's Parents, Mr and Mrs. James and Racheal Wordsmith, did their best to support Mr. Andrews with his task. teaching him the duties he was to perform.. Telling him the stories of various Secret keepers of the past and all.... Mr. Andrews had very little trouble with his charge- she grew up obedient, powerful, wise and yet extremely kind and beautiful. he was extremely fond of Nathasha whom he considered as his surrogate daughter.


Things were fine till Nathasha turned 17....an Age just a year away from her being legally eligible to rule her subjects... Mr. Andrews grew more and more quieter with each day... began spending a lot of time at home with his violin than his usual time with Nathasha as she took her magic classes...

Then one fine September morning, Mr. Andrews came home to take Nathasha out on a field trip.. "just round your favourite hang-outs- exactly as how when you were a kid!!"

But it wasn't a field trip... he took her to the gardens of Ged (a garden field accessible only to magical folks and secret keepers!!).

Nathasha had felt there was something off... but her faith in Mr. Andrews caused her to not question him..

until he came...

Nathasha knew him from her childhood.. he haunted her dreams every night... he was nothing more than a shadow... until he catches hold of your fears.. then he grows.. to become a cloud of darkness... Neither hope nor light or bravery too can save you from him... he intensifies your fears and grows with them.... Dawn of the Darkness, Throne of Death, Shadows - he went by many names....

"You said you would protect her" Mr. Andrews had said to the darkness.... Which was when Nathasha realized that it was a trap!!

"Mr. Andrews, we have to get away from here!!" Nathasha had pleaded... tugging at her mentor and friend !! But Mr. Andrews didn't budge, "he said he would protect you Nathasha!! he promised me he would"

"Mr. Andrews !! Philip !! please listen to me!! it's a trap- we have to leave!!" Then, when Nathasha had taken his first name, Philip Andrews looked back at her and realized the grave mistake that he had made- revealing her to the Shadows!! Filled with guilt, he allowed himself to be filled with fear too... made himself a prey to the Shadows thirst....

For all its strength, the shadows can consume just a single being at once... And with the fear and guilt in Philip growing ... the shadows took him...

leaving Nathasha alone... !!


and she had been alone- leaving her parents home, travelling from place to place... until the fates brought her to the school.. to her new secret keeper... to Nicholas...!!

Barely able to hold back her tears, Nathasha away from Nicholas, who said quietly, "I'm ready to listen!! What is going on??"
1111.title: Nathasha's memories

112.content:
"Nicolas, look at me," she said.

         Nicolas turned his frown toward her and crossed his arms in front of his chest, "I don't like getting yelled at by old ladies."

         "Forget that. Didn't your parents foretell my arrival? You should already know this."

         "Obviously not."

         "I am Natasha Moongold, Empress of Magic. Yokels call me "Head Witch," she spat. "I am the youngest Empress that has ever lived, but I deserve no less respect than those who came before me."

         "Sure, whatever. What does that have to do with me?"

         "When my predecessor was murdered, her protector suffered the same fate. He was tricked by the evil Guild of Logic and Science." Her eyes glowed red, but she brought herself back under control. "At the moment each of them were killed, their powers and skills were transferred to us. You are the Secret Keeper, my protector. You are descended of other secret-keepers. Your parents should have told you when the amulet began to glow. That is how they knew you'd been blessed.

         "You're a nut. I don't have any amulet. I'm just a nerd in high school who thought a pretty girl actually wanted to be his friend. Wow, was I stupid."

         Nicolas turned and started walking, but Natasha grabbed his shoulder and spun him around. He knocked her hands away and stared at her.

         "I was drawn to you. My family moved over three hundred miles because you are mine. Didn't you feel the connection? You walked right up to me on my first day of school and walked me to class. Why?"

         "I walked you to class because Mrs. Hermeties told me to. It was my job to escort you. I got credit for one hour of community service for it."

         Natasha pushed her long, brown locks from her face. "It changes nothing. The old woman did not recognize me until you allowed it."

         "How could you be invisible? People see you all the time at school."

         "She saw me, but she didn't recognize me. I was just another girl, sitting under an oak tree reading a book, until you told her who I was. In fact, you shouted it."

         The bell rang. Lunch was over and all of the students who'd come out to enjoy the last of the warm, autumn days headed back inside. Nicolas turned and stalked after them without a glance at Natasha.
112.title: Alternative

info.brief_description: when Nicolas discovers that his best friend is a witch..... and he is her secret keeper
info.description:
Nicholas was having a normal day in school... when a crazed women confronted him asking him to take her to the head witch!!

starting then... Nicholas' life changes... as he discovers that the girl he thought he knew and considered as his best friend is a witch (and what more- the head witch!!)

Nathasha had shifted to Nicholas' school recently and had befriended him knowing that it was his destiny and duty to be her secret-keeper (her guardian and protector...

But she had never told him that... as she knew that it was a dangerous job for him to undertake...

she kept it a secret from him.... until the day when the crazed lady found Nicholas... and forced Nathasha to tell him the truth
